alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 9:51PM CDT until April 25 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Coleman County in west central Texas... East central Runnels County in west central Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 950 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glen Cove, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Valera around 1010 PM CDT. Voss around 1025 PM CDT. Gouldbusk around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mozelle, Fisk, Shields and Hords Creek Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
